title: Ricki Lake announces death of 'soulmate' Christian Evans, 45, after battle with bipolar
text: 1 of 16 The Archers legend Sara Coward has died aged 69 The pair were married in 2012 at a secret ceremony in California but separated after two-and-half years and divorced in 2015 citing "irreconcilable differences" . In her emotional tribute to the late jewellery designer, Ricki wrote: "He was a man of love and what mends my broken heart today is knowing that he is finally at peace and his spirit is free." During their divorce proceedings, Christian reportedly tried to have their prenuptial agreement set aside, claiming that Ricki had defrauded him. Despite the allegations, the American star appears to have never stopped caring for him, opening up about her respect and love in the heartbreaking post. INSTAGRAM During their divorce proceedings Christian claimed that Ricki had defrauded him GETTY Ricki famously hosted the Ricki Lake Show from 1993 to 2004 Ricki wrote: "I am a greater person for having known him and spent the past six and a half years of my life with him." She is famous for hosting the Ricki Lake talk show from 1993 to 2004 and appeared as a guest judge on Gary Barlow's Let It Shine just last weekend. Ricki has two sons from her previous marriage to illustrator Rob Sussman, Milo, 19, and Owen, 15. Related articles
